70010000091705.description:
The hit Japanese game show “Run for Money” is coming to Nintendo Switch™!
The game retains the show’s signature runner mechanics, and for the first time in the series, this edition  introduces the all-new “Hunter Mode”!
Not only can you play as a runner escaping from hunters, you can also become a hunter and capture the runners!
This edition features five original stages: “Wonderland,” “Airport,” “Harbor,” “Fantasy,” and “Diver City.”Just like in the TV show, runners will face a variety of missions during each stage!
Clear all the mission and aim to make a successful escape!!

This latest edition also brings enhanced multiplayer features!
All 5 original stages are available for local and online multiplayer matches!
In online battles, the new "Hunter VS Runaway Mode" lets up to 12 players (4 Hunters, 8 Runaways) face off!
Let's all have a blast playing Run for Money!

"This version of the game was originally released for Nintendo Switch™.
While it can also be played on Nintendo Switch™ 2, please note that a separate version—“Run for Money: Hunter vs. Runner!
Which side will you win!?""—is available exclusively for Nintendo Switch™ 2."
Save data and additional content from previous versions are not compatible with this version.
Be sure to avoid accidental or duplicate purchases.
Additionally, this title does not offer a Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition or an upgrade pass.
70010000091705.intro:
The super popular "Run for Money" game is coming to Nintendo Switch™ !
Experience your very own "Run for Money"!!
70010000091705.name: "Run for Money": Hunter VS Runner! Which Side Will You Win With!?

70010000097365.description:
-Deep Tactical Dungeon-Crawling
-A Cozy, Gothic Art Style
-Unique Core Gameplay Per Chapter
-Random Events Triggered While Exploring
-Dream Wheel: Spin for Awesome Chest Loot
-A Spicy Challenge Mode: Strategy Meets Speedrun
-Three Escalating Difficulties: Normal, Hard & Abyss, Each with New Rules
70010000097365.intro: A deeply strategic game featuring an adorable feline hero! Dive into rich elemental builds, face randomized gear upgrades and breakthroughs, and master a unique core mechanic in every cha
70010000097365.name: Card Quest

70010000097985.description:
The Perfect Pencil is a surreal action platformer which tells the tale of personal development and the psychology of fear. Join protagonist John as he awakens in a bizarre hand-drawn kingdom and comes face-to-face with the terrors that dwell in the last place he'd have thought to look...

Embark on an emotional odyssey exploring the depths of an unfamiliar environment using protagonist John's innate ability to see things that others can’t. Make choices that will compel you to carve your own personal route through both light and darkness, however, beware, things might not be as they seem.

Go off the beaten path and discover numerous side quests dotted throughout the world, you never know what you might find. Both dark and comforting surreal landscapes filled with secrets, surprises and peculiar personalities are waiting to be unraveled.

John’s unique analysis ability grants you the power to uncover hidden information about NPCs, peculiar objects and elements of the environment. The Perfect Pencil is filled with additional lore and secrets for players to find. Roam beyond the beaten path, scan the world around you - Who knows... behind one of these corners you might find something that will change your perspective.

John’s fight from within, but he will also encounter tense boss battles in the form of unsettling manifestations - all symbolising unique elements of the human psyche. Some encounters may even make you question your sense of reality…but remember, in order to survive you will have to be willing to take risks.
70010000097985.intro: Lost in the kingdom of the white beast, will you find your way out? The Perfect Pencil is a story-driven action platformer that throws you into the innermost depths of the human mind.
70010000097985.name: The Perfect Pencil

70010000105107.description:
Long ago, when the world was engulfed in black mist, the surviving humans escaped to the Ark.

There's only one way to restore the world:
seek out the hidden Time Shades and activate the Clock Tower.
The Clock Tower will surely restore the world to a time of peace.

Awakening in the Twisted Land beneath the Ark,
Lucy finds she has no memories other than the words "Activate the Clock Tower"...

She joins forces with her companions and sets out in search of the Time Shades.

Blending RPG and card game elements

Recruit up to 4 companions and build the strongest party based on their skills and abilities. The skills of Lucy, the protagonist, and her companions are available as cards. Your choices determine what skills they learn!

Defeat is nothing to fear

Unlike traditional RPGs, everything resets when your party gets defeated, and new companions and skills become available. Perfect your strategy with each iteration.
70010000105107.intro: Chrono Ark, the deck-building roguelike RPG. Recruit companions with distinct personalities, build a party that maximizes skill synergies, and save the Twisted World!
70010000105107.name: Chrono Ark Deluxe Edition

70010000105661.description: In Everwarder there's you, and a procedurally-generated world covered in darkness. Touch it - and it will spawn a creature that will try to destroy your most precious thing – a crystal with your friend trapped inside. TOWER DEFENSE LIKE NO OTHER Every run starts with your crystal and a supply of energy. Then it's up to you how to fight the darkness. Do you steadily expand, clearing the darkness, harvesting its energy, and carefully deploying defenders to deal with whatever emerges from the dark? Or do you play it fast and loose, striking out to locate ancient structures and powerful artifacts hidden within? EVOLVE AND ADAPT Failure is just another word for learning. With every run you gather minerals and unlock new options on the upgrade tree, allowing you to become stronger and last longer against the darkness. After all, time is not on your side: Enemies grow stronger as the seconds tick on - but so do you, gathering new resources, boosts, and upgrading your defenders to last just a bit longer. ENDLESS CHALLENGE Every run is randomly generated, with its own set of challenges and twists that will keep you on your toes. Every upgrade tweaks the experience, creating various synergies. So even if you struggle to keep up with the pressure, there’s always a way to turn the tides of the battle!
70010000105661.intro: Fight against the encroaching darkness and fend off emerging enemies.
70010000105661.name: Everwarder

70010000106305.description:
Rise above the clouds and follow a solitary traveler on a quest that blends graceful platforming with peaceful exploration. Each level is a dreamlike chapter of a larger tale about loss, resolve, and the hope of earning a second chance for humanity. Glide across floating islands, scale soaring structures, and navigate shifting gravity as friendly spirit guides share fragments of the story and teach you new abilities.
Designed for flow and mindfulness, the game favors clarity over frustration: precise jumps feel good, challenges are fair, and environmental puzzles fit naturally into the world. The painterly art direction and ethereal soundtrack turn every vista into a moment worth lingering on—without rushing you forward.
Features
•	Skybound 3D platforming with double jumps and directional dashes
•	Gentle environmental puzzles woven into exploration
•	Five distinct areas per level with evolving mechanics
•	Surreal, stylized worlds and sweeping, meditative vistas
•	Narrative fragments from helpful spirit guides
•	Accessible difficulty focused on flow, not punishment
70010000106305.intro: Ascend through serene skies, guiding a lone traveler across floating realms to discover a hopeful second chance.
70010000106305.name: Celestial Ascend

70010000107387.description:
Have you ever dreamed of being the villain in a Tower Defense?

Be the one who sends waves and waves of troops to break through the enemy defenses in this Reverse Tower Defense. 

Summon, conquer and upgrade your troops to dominate the whole world!



Summon your troops and conquer!
Choose the troops, the order and the path you’ll send in each wave. Think of your strategies to conquer each map.


Invade countless maps!
Play through the kingdoms, each with their own features. Plains, forest, coast, wasteland, snowed mountains and desert, conquer everything on your own time.


Unlock new troops and upgrade them!
Unlock units, choose their profession, upgrade the stats and change their skins.


Conquer and hold kingdoms!
Dominate each state of the region, advance without rest with your troops to conquer the whole world. But take care, the states can rebel.



Characteristics:

- 6 Kingdoms with 52 maps total.
- 16 Enemy defenses.
- 12 Troops to unlock, each with 2 different professions.
- Many skins to each troop to use at your own liking.
- 6 Spells to help the units through the waves.
- A skilltree with more than 50 unlocks.
- Changing climate, rain, clouds, storm, mist… you can face many of them in your conquest.
70010000107387.intro: Be the villain in this Reverse Tower Defense. Send waves after waves of troops to break the enemy defenses.
70010000107387.name: Countless Army

70010000110640.description:
Tired of clutter? Ready to create spaces that are effortlessly stylish? Forget bulky, outdated furniture—your canvas awaits sleek lines, natural textures, and a calming, contemporary aesthetic.

Design Your Dream Spaces
• Curated Catalog: Dive into an ever-expanding library of modern, stylish, and simple furniture and décor. From mid-century inspired chairs and modular sofas to clean, geometric lighting and minimalist artwork, you'll find everything you need to achieve that perfect, magazine-worthy look.
• Room by Room: Take on decorating challenges for a variety of rooms: open-plan living areas, tranquil bedrooms, functional home offices, and chic kitchens. Each space presents unique layout puzzles to solve with elegance.
• Color Palettes: Experiment with sophisticated, muted color palettes and pops of striking accent colors typical of modern design.
• Textural Harmony: Mix and match woods, metals, glass, and luxurious fabrics to create depth while maintaining a clean aesthetic.

KEY FEATURES: 
-11 room shapes, from simple to challenging ones.
-500+ furniture and decoration items.
-50+ flooring and wallpaper patterns, from minimalistic to extravagant designs.
-Intuitive controls.
-Lo-fi music ensures a cozy, relaxing gaming experience. 
-Photography mode lets you admire your work in different angles and lights, as well as take beautiful screenshots to share your designs with friends and the community!
70010000110640.intro: Welcome to Simpli Casa, the chill and addictive decorating game where minimalism meets maximum style!
70010000110640.name: Simpli Casa

70010000111481.description:
Every victory draws attention.
In this pride filled paradise, confidence is part of the game.

Furry Pride Paradise: Love & Fun invites you into a world that celebrates expression, personality, and playful attraction. 

Through short, engaging minigames, each success unlocks new images, comments, and reactions that reflect the unique attitude of the furry boys around you.

This is a place where pride is visible in every smile, every reaction, and every bold comment.

Some furry boys stand out with fearless confidence.
Others reveal themselves slowly, watching how you play before opening up.
A few enjoy reacting to your choices, turning every win into a shared moment.

As you progress, the furry boys respond directly to your performance: teasing, commenting, and encouraging you to keep going. Your skill, focus, and curiosity shape what you see and who steps closer.

Win minigames, unlock scenes, and discover personalities that shine through confidence, attitude, and unapologetic charm.

Each victory adds a new layer to the experience, making every session feel expressive, rewarding, and full of character.

Fun, bold, and proudly expressive.


Features:

♥ PRIDEFUL FURRY BOYS: A diverse cast of furry boys that celebrate confidence, self expression, and playful charm.

♥ MINIGAMES WITH PERSONALITY: Clear challenges to unlock comments, reactions, and new interactions.

♥ UNLOCKABLE SCENES: Discover images and moments tied to your progress and performance.

♥ MULTIPLE FAVORITES: Different playstyles bring different furry boys into the spotlight.

♥ HIGH REPLAY VALUE: New reactions and outcomes encourage you to return again and again.


Are you ready to play and discover your favorite furry boy?
70010000111481.intro:
Colorful furry boys, playful challenges, and reactions full of personality.
Who will you unlock first in this pride filled paradise?
70010000111481.name: Furry Pride Paradise Love & Fun

70010000111487.description:
Welcome to a colorful world where charming furry girls turn every moment into playful fun.

Furry Girls Paradise mixes casual minigames with a light visual novel experience.

Each stage unlocks new images, cute reactions, and comments that reveal each girl’s unique personality.

Some are shy, some are confident, some are naturally flirty, and all of them express themselves with surprising comments as you play.

Your performance decides what you get to see and how each encounter progresses.

Win minigames, unlock scenes, and enjoy the reactions only these furry girls can give.


Features:

♥ CUTE & PLAYFUL GIRLS: Meet furry girls inspired by sweetness, charm, and colorful personalities.

♥ MINIGAMES & DIALOGUE: Alternate between quick challenges and fun conversations.

♥ UNLOCK SCENES: Discover new images and reactions with every success.

♥ MULTIPLE ENDINGS: Your progress shapes who becomes your favorite.

♥ HIGH REPLAY VALUE: Different outcomes and reactions every time you play.


Fun, charming, a little mischievous.
Are you ready to play?
70010000111487.intro:
Cute furry girls, playful challenges, and unexpected reactions.
Ready to discover who’s waiting behind each victory?
70010000111487.name: Furry Girls Paradise: Love & Fun

70010000111628.description:
Enjoy your stay in the worst place on Earth.

I Hate This Place is an isometric craft-based survival horror game set in a cursed land filled with reality-bending nightmares and terrifying creatures that thrive in the dark. You’ll need to scavenge, build, sneak, and fight if you want to make it out alive.

Classic Craft-Based Survival Horror

Scavenge every corner of Rutherford Ranch to stay alive. From haunted forests, a derelict town, to infested bunkers. Explore a world teeming with danger as you gather vital resources, craft essential gear, upgrade your campsite, and rebuild outposts to have somewhere to hide.

Day Prepares You. Night Hunts You

A dynamic day-night cycle that changes the world. Use daylight wisely to explore, scavenge supplies, craft what you need, and prepare for what’s coming. When night falls, the real nightmares come out to play. More enemies appear, stronger and more aggressive than before. The landscape becomes harder to navigate with just your flashlight. Sometimes your best hope is to find shelter and hunker down till morning.

Deadly Silence Goes A Long Way

Stealth and combat go hand-in-hand here as many of the twisted creatures in Rutherford Ranch hunt and stalk you by sound alone. Brute force will often just land you in an early grave. Use sound to your advantage, luring creatures away from your path or cleverly leading them straight into deadly traps you laid. 

80’s Vibes Meets Comic Book Flair

Inspired by the award-nominated comic book series created by Kyle Starks and Artyom Topilin, I Hate This Place comes to life with bold colors, a punchy retro comic book style, and a heavy dose of '80s flair. A unique blend of horror, dark humor, and just the right touch of camp and gore where unsettling dread meets stylized charm.
70010000111628.intro: Isometric craft-based survival horror with 80’s vibes and comic book flair
70010000111628.name: I Hate This Place

70010000112716.description:
Enjoy the relaxing puzzle of Habitat Shapes by organizing spaces for three animal families – mammals, birds, and reptiles – using Fence/Wall pieces to keep them separated. Watch out: different families cannot touch, and any attempt triggers a funny “fight cloud,” sending the last piece back to the conveyor.

With 30 levels split between the structured Urban Zoo and the organic Safari Sanctuary, Habitat Shapes offers short, accessible, and reversible challenges. Pick, rotate, and place pieces on the grid, experiment with undo and restart, and find the perfect layout of space and barriers. Each move brings small victories and satisfying moments without time pressure, letting you enjoy a flawlessly organized zoo.

Perfect for fans of spatial organization, subtle visual humor, and puzzles that reward smart experimentation.
70010000112716.name: Habitat Shapes

70010000112864.description:
Do you like platforming, exploration, and plumbing...? Uh, I mean... play-dough?! Well, we may not have pipes, but we can give you 64 reasons to join Crosak’s daring adventures.

1.	Become a real caveman jumping and clubbing your way through a multi-gravity universe made of sticky play-dough: six open worlds full of secrets plus three special worlds with everything a galaxy could wish for.

2.	Invite your favorite second player to have fun with Crosak and his friend Ena! Enjoy the full adventure in one- or two-player mode, switching whenever you like.

3.	Face crazy “Jurassic-inspired” enemies — from giant carnivorous plants to karate dinosaurs or our take on the missing link (the Kobi).

4.	Experiment with various power-ups to overcome the twisted planets’ challenges: anti-gravity feathers, rock-helmet, or flaming club, to name a few.

64.	And let’s not forget the main mission! Rescue the 60 cavemen from Routine Village captured by the fearsome warlock Double G. 60 objectives with all kinds of missions: races, pterodactyl flights, mini-games, free falls, T-Rex rides, powerful boss fights, and much more.

Don’t overthink it — give your world a spin with Crosak!
70010000112864.intro: Turn your world around and join Crosak on his Jurassic adventure in a multi-gravity playdough universe.
70010000112864.name: Crosak

70010000114279.description:
Lariat the witch will make your wish will come true if you win a game of trivia, but if you lose, something dark will happen instead. How many lives will your ignorance ruin?

Majotori is a narratrivia, an original little game that combines an interactive narrative with a quiz game.

Features:

- 25+ characters
- 50+ branching storylines
- 1000+ engaging questions for the modern geek
- 4 question categories (video games, cinema, animation, miscellaneous) with customizable frequency of appearance
- A character dying a horrible death because you don't watch enough anime
70010000114279.intro: How many lives will your ignorance ruin? Majotori is a narratrivia, an original little game that combines an interactive narrative with a quiz game.
70010000114279.name: Majotori

70010000114304.description:
Move through 3D space to find hints, solve mysteries and escape from the room.
Anyone can play to the end because you can see hints and answers.
70010000114304.name: Escape game R00M09

70010000115357.description:
In this lively illustration filled with many characters and objects,
your task is to find the specified paw print within the time limit.
Enjoy an easy and fun brain-training game!

How to play:
・Look carefully at the target paw print shown
・Search for the same paw print within the illustration
・When you find it, tap the spot before time runs out!

It may seem easy at first, but with a time limit,
you’ll be surprised how challenging it can be!

If you get stuck, the hint button will help you gently,
showing you the area where the answer is hidden.


The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000115357.intro: meooow meow meow meow meow  meow meow meow meow meoow!!
70010000115357.name: nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan

70050000048821.description:
This DLC includes various console ports of Tiger-Heli and Kyukyoku Tiger.
On top of that, it also includes the rare beat-'em-up Get Star and its Western version Guardian, both released outside the arcades for the very first time!
*You must have a copy of the digital download version of Kyukyoku Tiger-Heli in order to play the content of this DLC.

Seven console ports
Various console versions of Tiger-Heli and Kyukyoku Tiger were made in and outside Japan, and seven of them are included in this collection. Each of them tackles the difficult mission of recreating the arcade experience in unique and inventive ways. This is the ultimate way to study the different aspects of the Tigers in their diverse habitats!

Get Star: an arcade rarity
Originally released in 1986, Get Star is an arcade side-scrolling beat-'em-up, where you play the role of the titular robot, combating enemies with punches, kicks, and occasional special weapons. Free six planets from the oppressive rule of Big Demorr!
Also includes the international version, Guardian!

The following games will be added to the base game with this DLC:
• Kyukyoku Tiger FC Ver. (1989)
• Kyukyoku Tiger PC Engine Ver. (1989)
• Kyukyoku Tiger Mega Drive Ver. (1991)
• Twin Cobra NES Ver. (1989)
• Twin Cobra Genesis Ver. (1991)
• Tiger-Heli FC Ver. (1986)
• Tiger Heli NES Ver. (1987)
• Get Star (1986)
• Guardian (1986)
70050000048821.name: Kyukyoku TigerHeli - Console Ports + Get Star Pack

70010000095477.description:
Do you have it? In GUTS, you can take part in the legendary sports-action show and compete in classic events to test your mettle before you reach the radical rock itself - the Aggro Crag!

Rocko's Modern Life: Spunky's Dangerous Day is a unique puzzle platforming game where you have to guide Spunky out of harm's way. The game takes you across sixteen hazard-filled levels and locales inspired by the show itself. You might even run into some of O-Town's most well-known residents.

Finally, in AAAHH!!! Real Monsters, you get to take direct control of everyone's favorite monsters - Ickis, Oblina, and Krumm! Both versions are included, so you can leave the console wars in the '90s and re-experience the game on your preferred 16-bit machine!

In addition to the games themselves, several extra features are included:

-Rewind: Made a mistake? Don't worry! You can rewind to try again.
-Save Anywhere: Need a break? Bring up the menu and save your game whenever you want.
-Music Player: Just want to listen to the great music in these games? We've got you covered!
70010000095477.intro: Relive the 90s in this collection of classic Nickelodeon games!
70010000095477.name: Nickelodeon Splat Pack

70010000096780.description:
Outrun your friends. Outsmart your rivals. Out-chaos them all!
From the makers of Running Fable comes Petite Party, a wild and unpredictable spin-off that cranks up the chaos. Battle through 16 competitive mini-games and dominate the tabletop party board where anything goes. In Running Fable Petite Party, there’s no holding back — every round is a chance to taunt your friends, steal victory, and cause maximum mayhem.

Key Features:
- 16 Mayhem-Fueled Mini-Games – Outsprint, outbalance, outwit, or outright sabotage your friends in quick-fire challenges designed to trigger laughs and playful rage.
- Tabletop Strategy Meets Party Madness – Roll the dice and plan across 3 competitive boards where the smallest choices lead to the biggest betrayals.
- Rivalry Ready – Perfect for 1–4 players; whether you’re teaming up or turning on each other, every match is a test of speed, reflexes, and friendship.
- Designed for Teasing – Easy controls mean anyone can join in, but only the bold (and lucky) can claim victory. Trash talk encouraged.
- From the World of Running Fable – Return to a vibrant, fabled universe full of quirky characters, ridiculous physics, and hilarious animations.

It’s not just a party — it’s a battlefield disguised in balloons.
Running Fable Petite Party is what happens when tabletop strategy meets competitive chaos. Who will stand victorious? And who will never live that loss down?
70010000096780.intro: Running Fable Petite Party throws you and your friends into 16 fast-paced, friendship-testing mini-games across 3 tabletop arenas.
70010000096780.name: Running Fable Petite Party

70010000110253.description:
Diver, Catch & Cook Simulator lets you explore the ocean’s depths by day and run a sushi restaurant by night. Hunt fish and strange marine creatures using harpoons, weapons, and underwater tools, then turn your catch into delicious dishes to earn profits and upgrade your gear. Manage oxygen, face unknown threats, and dive deeper to discover rare species and hidden zones.

Key Features
- Day & Night Gameplay Loop: Dive for fish by day, run a sushi restaurant by night
- Harpoon Combat & Fishing: Use harpoons to catch fish and creatures — with hook for automatic loot or without hook for manual collection
- Deep-Sea Exploration: Discover new depths, biomes, and dangerous creatures
- Crafting & Upgrades: Improve suits, weapons, and underwater scooters
- Progression-Based Discovery: Unlock new fish, creatures, and challenges as you dive deeper

Take a deep breath, dive in, and master the balance between survival, exploration, and culinary success.
70010000110253.intro: Balance survival, exploration, and culinary mastery in every dive.
70010000110253.name: Diver, Catch & Cook Simulator

70010000111440.description:
The beloved classic returns in a remastered edition, featuring improved visuals and enhanced atmospheric presentation.

◆STORY
In Mitono, a remote mountain village with only a handful of households, every child must undergo a mysterious ritual known as Warawa-Tomurai. Sixth-graders Yuuma and Honoka take part in the ceremony just before the village begins to disperse. 

Yuuma’s family soon moves to the city, while Honoka remains behind due to unforeseen circumstances. Separated, the two begin to uncover the secrets behind the ritual. 

Within the sanctum where something inhuman resides, the children are drawn in—toward a painful fate.

◆REMASTERED FEATURES
- Some background images have been replaced with new assets, giving the game a distinctly different visual impression from the original.
- The user interface has been redesigned for improved readability and usability.
- New text dialogues sounds enhance immersion in the story.
- Save slot count has been expanded to 21, allowing for more flexible play.
- English language support opens the experience to a wider global audience.
70010000111440.intro:
They buried the dolls for us that night. 
But the story didn’t end with the soil.
70010000111440.name: Our Burial Dolls Remastered

70010000115298.description:
Clover Cove is a peaceful, exploration-driven walking simulator that invites you to wander across a colossal island dominated by a towering ancient castle. Discover quiet beaches, hidden groves, abandoned locations, mysterious ruins, and countless other hand-crafted locations—all at your own pace.

There are no enemies, no combat, and no pressure. Just curiosity, atmosphere, and the joy of uncovering a world that feels alive, forgotten, and waiting for you.

Features:
>A Giant Island to Explore

>A Massive Castle That Looms Over Everything

> Atmospheric, Immersive Worldbuilding

> Go Anywhere, Discover Everything

> Relaxing Music & Natural Soundscapes
70010000115298.intro: A serene walking simulator set on a vast island full of secrets.
70010000115298.name: Clover Cove

70010000115525.description:
Toree and his friends invite you to jump through four colourful and varied 3d platformer games. Toree's 3D Platformer Collection includes the following four titles: Toree 3D (incl. Toree Jumbled Jam extra levels), Toree 2 (incl. winter-themed extra levels), Macbat 64 and Regina & Mac. Additionally, you can unlock a secret extra game. 

These four games represent a variety of playstyles from arcade-style high speed platforming in Toree 2 to precise collection-based platforming in Regina & Mac. In this collection, the individual games are extended by a new Time Attack mode in which you can record individual best times for simple playthroughs or complete run throughs. The recorded time is rated with a rating from C to S.
70010000115525.intro: Four fun 3d platformers featuring a variety of gameplay concepts, suitable for all ages and ranges of experience.
70010000115525.name: Toree's 3D Platformer Collection

70010000115769.description:
Take care of your kitten or puppy with food, water, and lots of love.

- Feed, give water, and show affection

- Play 8 challenging minigames

- Earn rewards and unlock skins

- Customize your pet and your home
70010000115769.intro: Adopt a kitten or puppy and follow your companion’s daily life.
70010000115769.name: Petmagotchi

70010000115971.description:
Offroad Rally Racing is a fast-paced console racing game where you drive powerful rally cars across clearly marked tracks in different weather conditions, including sunny, rainy, and night races. Each track offers a unique challenge, forcing you to adapt your driving to changing visibility and road grip.

Win races to earn cash, which you can use to unlock and purchase new rally cars. Every victory brings you closer to building a stronger garage and taking on tougher tracks.

With easy-to-learn controls and exciting offroad action, Offroad Rally Racing delivers simple, fun racing focused on skill, speed, and progression.
70010000115971.intro: Rally through sun, rain, and night.
70010000115971.name: Offroad Rally Racing

70050000067863.description: Each cat has its own story and personality. Our heroes would like to show you their strengths! Get to know them and enjoy the game even more.
70050000067863.intro: Discover the stories of the feline heroes of our game!
70050000067863.name: Cat's Stories

70070000032792.description:
Can you find two identical cats? Use your pattern recognition skills and match the cats in pairs! Plus, learn about their history and personalities!
Each cat has its own story and personality. Our heroes would like to show you their strengths! Get to know them and enjoy the game even more.
70070000032792.intro: Discover the stories of the feline heroes of our game!
70070000032792.name: Spot the Cat: Stories Edition

70070000032841.description:
Racers, beware! 

Fast-paced, polished and dynamic motorbike racing now on Nintendo Switch™!

One of a kind game entirely playable with any control method including... Toy-Con™ Motorbike! (Nintendo Labo™ Toy-Con 01: Variety Kit)

Forget about speed limits and the rules of the road! Here, you are in charge!

A unique mix of endless and arcade racing game featuring countless hours of fun!

MOTO RUSH GT FEATURES:

• Over 100 levels to beat!
• Endless racing experience
• 12 customizable motorbikes
• Toy-Con Motorbike support – dust off your LABO if you have it!
• Race against time, ghost opponents or try various challenges! 
• Tilt support – play by rotating your console!
• Play with Nintendo Switch™ Pro Controller, or any other control method!
• Support all play styles - TV, Tabletop, Handheld, Toy-Con Motorbike
• Experience 4 different game modes 
• Weather and day-cycle effects: rain, night, storm! 
• Experience beautifully designed roads from around the world

This bundle includes base game and Grip Collection #4 with:

• four pairs of state-of-the-art racing gloves, crafted for the ultimate grip and control. Outshine and outpace your rivals!

Check it out!
70070000032841.intro: Ultimate motorbike racing experience for all ages!
70070000032841.name: Moto Rush GT Essentials Edition

70070000032955.description:
In S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope you will shoot, you will fight, and you will win!

Play S.N.I.P.E.R., the latest sniping game where you aim, fight and destroy virtual enemies. Try different types of missions, inspired both by classic rail shooters and modern cover shooters. Fight your way out during day and night, destroy evil forces and unlock new weapons and power-ups.

Game includes:
15+ STAGES
30+ WEAPONS
30+ GALLERY ITEMS
60+ SPECIAL ACHIEVEMENTS 

Become a hunter, mount your scope, and fight for our freedom!

This bundle includes base game, Target Acquired and Expansion Pack #2 with:

- RIF-16-DOT rifle: a high-tech rifle with a dot sight for quick target acquisition 
- SN-200-FOR sniper rifle: a powerful and accurate sniper rifle for long-range engagements 
- SN-300-FFD sniper rifle: a versatile sniper rifle for special assignments
- SN-400-SKY sniper rifle: a sleek design combined with cutting-edge technology 
- FMS-1-G rifle
70070000032955.name: S.N.I.P.E.R - Hunter Scope Hero's Edition

70010000107498.description:
Get ready to grab your shovel and dig the most epic holes on the world’s most exotic beaches! In Hole Digging Beach - Simulator, every grain of sand matters, and every hole could hide a treasure, a surprise, or just pure fun. Relax in this lighthearted simulator where the sun, the waves, and the sand become your personal playground.

Key Features:
• Detailed tropical beaches – Explore diverse locations, from deserted islands to lively tourist shores, each with its own secrets and breathtaking scenery.
• Customizable tools – Collect, unlock, and upgrade shovels, pickaxes, and other tools—each with unique benefits and distinct visual styles.
• Hidden treasures and mysteries – Uncover rare items, lost relics, or clues to greater mysteries as you dig deeper into the sand.
• Character customization – Create your perfect beach avatar with fun outfits, silly hats, and accessories that make you stand out in the sun.

Whether you’re hunting for buried treasure or just aiming to dig the perfectly round hole, Hole Digging Beach - Simulator is the perfect place where the sun never sets on the fun!
70010000107498.intro: Dig, explore, and discover the secrets buried beneath exotic beaches.
70010000107498.name: Hole Digging Beach Simulator

70010000110786.description:
That winter, I met a girl with silver hair.
As the seasons quietly changed, two closed-off hearts began to connect through a single “story.”
Each time the snow fell, the world was wrapped in silence, and unspoken feelings quietly piled up.
In a quiet corner of the academy begins a gentle yet heartrending tale that weaves the soul—of solitude, hope, and rebirth.
Just like snow softly covering everything, this story may quietly settle in someone’s heart as well.
Your words might be able to change someone’s future.
Includes Japanese voice acting.
70010000110786.intro: Beyond the falling snow awaits the miracle of meeting you.
70010000110786.name: Whispers of Winter Blossom

70010000110229.description:
Step into the shoes of a professional freerunner and conquer urban landscapes like never before! In Parkour Simulator 2026, master jumps, flips, wall-runs, and vaults as you navigate rooftops, alleys, and obstacles with precision and style.

Train your skills, perform daring stunts, and unlock new abilities as you tackle increasingly challenging courses. Whether racing against the clock or exploring the city at your own pace, every move counts in your quest to become the ultimate parkour master.

Key Features:
	•	Realistic Movement – Experience fluid, dynamic parkour mechanics.
	•	Challenging Courses – Test your skills across rooftops, alleys, and urban environments.
	•	Stunt System – Perform flips, wall-runs, vaults, and combos with precision.
	•	Progression & Upgrades – Unlock new abilities and improve your freerunner’s skills.
	•	Freestyle & Exploration – Freely explore the city or compete in timed challenges.

Can you master the city and become the ultimate parkour legend?
70010000110229.intro: Jump, flip, and run across rooftops to become the ultimate parkour master.
70010000110229.name: Parkour Simulator 2026
70010000110229.publisher: Lu Ming trading as Shane Game

70050000059376.description:
Additional content for the battle arena in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined.

<The Road of Regal Wretches>
Challenge legendary demon kings from the DRAGON QUEST series’ Erdrick Trilogy in the Battle Arena! Defeat them to earn valuable rewards, including “Erdrick’s Sword”!

[Monsters you can fight in The Road of Regal Wretches]
・The Original Demon
・Master of Destruction
・The Lord of Darkness

*This product does not include the base game of DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined.
*This product is also included in the "Digital Deluxe Edition" and the "Additional DLC Sets". Please be careful to avoid making duplicate purchases.
*To play The Road of Regal Wretches, you will need to progress in the game and unlock the battle arena.
*The Road of Regal Wretches can be accessed by talking to the She-Slime at the battle arena reception desk.
70050000059376.name: The Road of Regal Wretches

70050000059379.description:
A set of costumes for DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined.

<Luminary's Livery>
Dress up as the characters from DRAGON QUEST XI: Echoes of an Elusive Age with this costume set! 
Put these outfits on from time to time for a nice change of pace!

[Contents]
・Luminary's Livery (Appearance changing costume for your Hero)
・Spiky Sidekick's Costume (Appearance changing costume for Kiefer)
・Red Sisterly Smock (Appearance changing costume for Maribel)
・Green Sisterly Smock (Appearance change costume for Maribel)
・Fully Fabulous Finery (Appearance change costume for Ruff)
・Warrior Princess Wardrobe (Appearance change costume for Aishe)
・Auld Rogue's Outfit (Appearance change costume for Sir Mervyn)

*This product does not include the base game of DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined.
*This product is also included in the "Digital Deluxe Edition" and the "Additional DLC Sets". Please be careful to avoid making duplicate purchases.
*Contents can be received from the "Claim Special Rewards" menu in the game.
70050000059379.name: Luminary's Livery

70050000059382.description:
A set of items that can be used in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined.

<Jam-Packed Swag Bag>
An assortment of items to assist your adventure!
Set forth on your journey with these helpful items!

[Contents]
・Slime Sword x1
・Slime Boomerang x1
・Slime Stick x1
・Metal Slime Heart (Grants experience boost) x1
・Gold Golem Heart (Grants gold boost) x1
・Medicinal Herb x9
・Single Phial x3
・Seed of Strength x1
・Seed of Resilience x1
・Seed of Life x1

*This product does not include the base game of DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined.
*This product is also included in the "Digital Deluxe Edition" and the "Additional DLC Sets". Please be careful to avoid making duplicate purchases.
*Some items in this product can also be obtained by progressing in the game.
*Contents can be received from the "Claim Special Rewards" menu in the game.
70050000059382.name: Jam-Packed Swag Bag

70050000059385.description:
・Trodain Togs (appearance changing costume for your Hero)
・Seed of Proficiency x3
70050000059385.name: Early Bird Bonus: Trodain Togs, Seed of Proficiency x3

70050000059388.description:
The "Red Slime Shield" will be included in your purchased copy of DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined.

*This item will not be included in the physical version.
*This item can be received from the "Claim Special Rewards" menu in the game.
70050000059388.name: Red Slime Shield

70070000029520.description:
Includes the full game, "Additional DLC Sets", and 48 hours of early access to the full game. Embark on an epic adventure ahead of everybody else!

[Contents]
・DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined base game
・DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined "Additional DLC Sets"
    Additional DLC - The Road of Regal Wretches
    Additional DLC - Luminary's Livery
    Additional DLC - Jam-Packed Swag Bag
・48 hours of early access
・White Wolf Costume (Appearance changing costume for Ruff)

*After the launch of DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined, the "Additional DLC Sets" and each additional DLC will also be available for individual purchase. Please be careful to avoid making duplicate purchases.
*Some items in the additional DLCs can also be obtained by progressing in the game.
*To play The Road of Regal Wretches, you will need to progress in the game and unlock the battle arena.
*The Road of Regal Wretches can be accessed by talking to the She-Slime at the battle arena reception desk.
*Contents such as the costumes and items can be received from the "Claim Special Rewards" menu in the game.

*This product is a bundle that includes DRAGON QUEST VII, released for Nintendo Switch™, and additional content pertaining to that title.
*This product can be played on both Nintendo Switch™ and Nintendo Switch™ 2, but there is also a separate version of DRAGON QUEST VII that can only be played on Nintendo Switch™ 2.
*This product is not compatible with the DRAGON QUEST VII Digital Deluxe Upgrade released for Nintendo Switch™ 2.
*The content included in this bundle is also sold separately. Please be careful to avoid making duplicate purchases.
70070000029520.intro: Unravel the mysteries of the past in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined
70070000029520.name: DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined Digital Deluxe Edition

70010000097429.description:
Race Together!
Share the excitement with friends and family playing split-screen multiplayer.
Hop in a formula car and race on unique tracks from around the world. With its multiple difficulty settings and accessibility options such as assist mode and gyroscopic controls, 4PGP can be enjoyed by everyone from beginners to experts. 

From beginners to experts, fun for everyone!
・Singleplayer: Championship, Quick Race, and Time Attack
・Split-screen multiplayer with up to four players
・19 unique cars based on real formula cars
・14 different circuits from around the world that can also be played in reverse.
・Four difficulty levels: ROOKIE, NOVICE, VETERAN, and EXPERT
・Gyroscopic controls and Assist mode for beginners
・Learn how to play with an extensive tutorial mode!
・60FPS in TV, Handheld, and Tabletop Mode
70010000097429.intro: Enjoy the excitement of 90's arcade games anywhere and with anyone!
70010000097429.name: 4PGP

70010000103557.description:
The game takes place in the dream of an eight-year-old boy. When an alien entity appears and threatens his family and the stability of the dream world itself, Jimmy sets out on an adventure to save his family and eradicate the threat of the Pulsating Mass. Along the way, Jimmy will have to work with his family, confront his own shortcomings, and brave the creeping nightmares of his subconscious.

Features:
* Full-length Japanese-style RPG.
* Classic turn-based combat with some modern sensibilities.
* A big emphasis on exploration.
* As an empathetic kid, Jimmy gains the ability to imagine himself as several of the monsters he meets, allowing him to interact with the world in new ways.
* These different transformations can also be leveled up, granting Jimmy higher stats and new abilities.
* A story for adults delivered from the perspective of a child.
* Jokes.
* Unspeakable horrors.
70010000103557.name: Jimmy and the Pulsating Mass

70010000110105.description:
Race Together!
Share the excitement with friends and family playing split-screen multiplayer.
Hop in a formula car and race on unique tracks from around the world. With its multiple difficulty settings and accessibility options such as assist mode and gyroscopic controls, 4PGP can be enjoyed by everyone from beginners to experts. 

From beginners to experts, fun for everyone!
・Singleplayer: Championship, Quick Race, and Time Attack
・Split-screen multiplayer with up to four players
・19 unique cars based on real formula cars
・14 different circuits from around the world that can also be played in reverse.
・Four difficulty levels: ROOKIE, NOVICE, VETERAN, and EXPERT
・Gyroscopic controls and Assist mode for beginners
・Learn how to play with an extensive tutorial mode!
・60FPS in TV, Handheld, and Tabletop Mode
70010000110105.intro: Enjoy the excitement of 90's arcade games anywhere and with anyone!
70010000110105.name: 4PGP - Nintendo Switch 2 Edition

70010000111409.description:
The natural order has been disrupted, and it’s up to you to set things straight again! Travel to the forest, volcano and winter biomes as a brainteasing top-down adventure ensues.

Tiny Biomes is a relaxing yet challenging tile-rotation puzzle game where you must guide the flow of water, snow or lava to bring life back to the biomes, each consisting of 50 unique levels of gradually increasing complexity and challenge.

As you progress deeper into these biomes, you will encounter more tiles and branching paths. Each level offers up three stars. The fewer moves you use, the more stars you earn!

• Guide the flow of water, snow and lava to restore life to each biome!
• Rotate landscape tiles in engaging, relaxing puzzle gameplay.
• Enjoy colorful aesthetics and HD graphics!
• Master 150 unique stages across forest, volcano and winter biomes.
• Replay levels to use fewer moves and earn more stars!
70010000111409.intro: Restore life to the troubled lands in tile-based brainteaser style!
70010000111409.name: Tiny Biomes

70010000111597.description:
In Delivery of Us, you guide a clever carrier pigeon on a mission to deliver every letter across the city’s rooftops. Plan each route carefully, because every move counts. Once the counter hits zero, the delivery fails.

This relaxing logic and movement-based puzzle game combines smooth mechanics, strategic planning, and calm visuals. Each level challenges you to find the most efficient path to every mailbox while avoiding walls, hazards, and obstacles along the way.

Discover different rooftop settings, from cozy neighborhoods to corporate towers, and enjoy the peaceful yet clever atmosphere as you test your reasoning skills.

Features

Solve handcrafted puzzles with limited moves

Plan precise routes across creative rooftop layouts

Deliver every letter before time runs out

Enjoy a relaxing experience with charming visuals and intuitive controls

For players who love clever puzzles, logical challenges, and the simple joy of delivering smiles one letter at a time
70010000111597.intro: Take flight into a charming puzzle adventure!
70010000111597.name: Delivery of Us

70010000112469.description:
World of Unlit is a fast paced, first person movement shooter where your goal is to utilize your grapple hook, melee weapons, guns and bows to destabilize a culture.

Fight your way through Unlit territory and destroy all the statues you find along your way, the unique and skill demanding movement is your best tool to complete your mission.
70010000112469.name: World Of Unlit

70050000067097.description:
◆Four Ways to Play
In addition to singleplayer and split-screen multiplayer, play with your friends using GameShare locally or via GameChat!

◆4K Support in TV Mode
Experience the breathtaking speed in 4K resolution with 60FPS.

◆Optimized Framerate
Native framerate of 120fps for 1-2 players and 90fps for 3 or more players in Full HD.
70050000067097.intro: Enjoy the excitement of 90's arcade games anywhere and with anyone!
70050000067097.name: 4PGP - Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Upgrade Pack

70010000070157.description:
*This is the Nintendo Switch™ version.
There is also a Nintendo Switch™ 2 version of this game. Please select the version you require carefully. 

"There's more to the world than this island... And we're going to prove it!"

Set sail on an adventure spanning past and present in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined!

As a bright-eyed young fisherman's son, you've lived your entire life on the peaceful island of Estard. Your journey begins with a simple question: is there more to the world than this small island kingdom?

On a quest for answers, you and your childhood friends discover the Shrine of Mysteries and are swept back in time. There, you uncover the shocking truth that entire lands have been sealed away by a malevolent force.

The fate of the world now rests in your hands.

DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined brings a timeless classic to life in a whole new way with charming diorama visuals, updated gameplay mechanics, and a streamlined story,.

For seasoned adventurers, rediscover a tale of plucky companions that is brimming with joy and heartbreak. For fledgling heroes new to the series, this is a great place to begin your DRAGON QUEST journey.

■A Diorama Brought to Life
DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined blends a beautiful diorama art style with Akira Toriyama's iconic character designs to make every encounter feel vibrant, heartfelt, and full of adventure. From lush forests and bustling towns to ancient ruins and whimsical monsters, every environment is bursting with color and personality.

■Travel through History to Restore the Present
Scattered stone fragments unlock portals to long-lost eras with their own challenges to solve. Restore the islands, solve mysteries, and make allies in the past to breathe life back into the present.

■A Beloved Tale with a Streamlined Narrative
DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined is told through a series of vignettes with an overarching narrative. The main story has also been streamlined to make the journey more accessible to all players. 

■Classic Combat, Improved!
The battle system in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined has undergone significant changes. Turn the tides of battle with new vocational perks. Each vocation has its own unique ability, from all-out attacks to those that support your allies. Battle speed adjustments and an auto-battle feature are also available. Battles can progress without interruptions between each turn, depending on the tactics selected for the protagonist and allies. While on the field, players can pre-emptively strike monsters and instantly defeat them If the monster is weaker than the party. 

■Moonlight and Level Up Two Vocations at the Same Time!
Customize your playstyle with the new Moonlighting mechanic. Having two vocations assigned at once provides access to the skills, magic spells, and unique perks from both.
70010000070157.intro: Unravel the mysteries of the past in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined
70010000070157.name: DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined

70010000094367.description:
Sir Solomon and the Saviors of Light depart Castle Cornelius to free Princess Tsuna from the grasp of the evil Devil Lord!

But the knight is worried... What if after being freed, the princess falls in love with one of his friends instead of with him?

So he does what anyone would do when blinded by love, and ditches his friends!

Solomon ventures into the Devil Lord's castle alone, vowing to steal the princess's heart.

LABS and Matt Kap present Lovish, an outrageous 8-bit-styled action-adventure game! Venture through a series of bite-sized rooms, slicing up monsters, collecting items and getting to the exit! After exiting each room, enjoy a short event scene, in which anything could happen! Will you find an item? A random encounter RPG fight? Will the world get destroyed? Find out by conquering each room of the Devil Lord's castle, one challenge at a time!

Features:

- 50+ fun levels to play through, each with multiple objectives!
- Wacky randomized event scenes between levels with hundreds of outcomes! You never know what you're gonna see next!
- Collect a variety of items to upgrade Solomon's abilities, or expand the game in meaningful (and unmeaningful) ways!
- Spend your pennies (in-game currency to be clear, no microtransactions here) in the in-game shop!
100+ characters, some of which were designed by world-famous manga artist Ryusuke Mita (Dragon Half)
- An exciting, 20+ tune soundtrack by Matt Kap (Castle In The Darkness, Astalon: Tears of the Earth)
- Beautiful human-artist-made pixel art! Even the in-game AI art is drawn by a human person!
- More secrets than ever before! (But this is the first game in this series, so that doesn't mean much, I guess.)
- Unexpected guest characters
And lots more!

So please, be a good friend, and help Solomon rescue the princess!
70010000094367.intro: The only thing more dangerous than monsters is unrequited love.
70010000094367.name: Lovish

70010000106262.description:
From the moment you arrive, attention feels natural.

The hotel is elegant and relaxed, but the atmosphere carries something more. Certain women notice you immediately. Their interest isn’t rushed, it’s assured. Smiles come easily. Conversations feel effortless. And when they speak, it’s clear they know exactly what they want.

In Mom Crush: Hidden Hotel Love Story, you step into a narrative built around confidence, attraction, and being desired. This isn’t about chasing attention, it’s about responding to it.

These women are experienced, self-assured, and direct in their own way. They enjoy testing chemistry, guiding conversations, and deciding when to move closer. Your role is to recognize the moment, match their energy, and choose how far each connection goes.

This visual novel focuses on chemistry, presence, and the appeal of being wanted, all within a refined, relaxed hotel setting.

Let them make the first move.
Decide how the story ends.


Features

● ADULT ROMANCE VISUAL NOVEL: A story centered on attraction, confidence, and mature relationships.

● CONFIDENCE DRIVEN CHOICES: Your responses influence desire, chemistry, and how women react to you.

● MULTIPLE ROUTES & ENDINGS: Each relationship follows a distinct path based on your decisions.

● CHARACTER LED ROMANCE: Women with strong presence, personality, and intention.

● ELEGANT HOTEL SETTING: A luxurious vacation backdrop that enhances mood and connection.

● ANIME VISUAL NOVEL STYLE: Stylish character art that emphasizes expression and chemistry.


Choose carefully who you let close.
Play now!
70010000106262.intro:
Confident women.
Undeniable attraction.
A story where you’re chosen.
70010000106262.name: Mom Crush: Hidden Hotel Love Story

70010000106284.description:
The hotel looks peaceful at first.
Sunlit corridors, quiet lounges, and guests who seem perfectly composed.

But attention lingers in subtle ways.
A glance held for a second too long.
A conversation that shifts without warning.
Men whose confidence feels practiced… and intentional.

In Sugar Daddy Crush: Hidden Hotel Love Story, you step into an adult narrative focused on attraction, restraint, and emotional timing. 

Your stay becomes a series of encounters shaped by dialogue, perception, and the choices you make in each moment.

These are men who value control, image, and experience. Getting closer isn’t about bold gestures, but about understanding when to speak, when to wait, and when silence says more than words.

Every response affects how relationships unfold. What feels casual may open unexpected paths, while a single misstep can quietly close a connection before it begins. 

Trust builds gradually through shared moments, unspoken interest, and the sense of being noticed.

As the days pass, motivations surface, boundaries shift, and the hotel reveals more than its elegant exterior suggests. Not every path leads to romance, and not every story ends the same.

This is a visual novel driven by atmosphere, character presence, and the tension between curiosity and restraint.


Features:

● ADULT STORY DRIVEN VISUAL NOVEL: A narrative experience focused on mature relationships, subtle attraction, and emotional tension.

● CHOICE BASED DIALOGUE: Every response influences trust, distance, and how each connection evolves.

● MULTIPLE ROUTES & ENDINGS: Different paths lead to distinct outcomes shaped by your decisions.

● CHARACTER FOCUSED ENCOUNTERS: Each guest brings his own presence, pace, and boundaries to the story.

● ATMOSPHERIC HOTEL SETTING: A refined vacation backdrop where quiet moments carry meaning.

● ANIME VISUAL NOVEL: Expressive character art designed to highlight mood and emotion.


Choose carefully who you let close.
Play now!
70010000106284.intro:
Elegant men.
Hidden intentions.
A love story you control.
70010000106284.name: Sugar Daddy Crush: Hidden Hotel Love Story

70010000107473.description:
Also features a built-in “Survivor Mode”.

In the world of Magic Rune Stone, battle through challenging rooms. Mix and match unique skills and equipment, select exclusive abilities, and craft a truly custom character. A massive selection of skills, gear, unique Blessings, and Treasures delivers thrilling, high-stakes gameplay.

Each hero has a dedicated Signature Skill Slot, featuring a different ability per character. Each also has a unique upgrade tree for this skill. Use different Blessings to unlock and select from various skill specializations.

Every character has 4 Universal Skill Slots. Universal Skills are equipped during a run via Skill Stones. Each can be upgraded with Blessings to significantly boost its power; some even gain entirely new mechanics.

A hero can carry up to 9 pieces of Equipment. Gear comes in 4 rarity tiers, with higher rarities granting better stats and sometimes unique effects. Equipment also provides Blessings, allowing for deep build customization.

Treasures are powerful artifacts that boost your damage output or survivability. Experiment by combining their effects with your Equipment and Blessings to discover powerful new builds and playstyles.
70010000107473.intro: An action Roguelite adventure! Play as distinct heroes, outfit them with varied gear and blessings, and take on mighty foes empowered by legendary Treasures.
70010000107473.name: Magic Rune Stone

70010000111552.description:
A thousand years ago, the divine created the world and six eggs. The beings born from them, called Spirit Beasts, were entrusted with prosperity but eventually rebelled. Enraged, the divine sealed them away and vanished, leaving behind humanity, the Divine Sword, and the Seed of Hope. Now, fate stirs once more as a new hero rises...

Experience a nostalgic pixel-art RPG packed with classic turn-based battles, a board game-style growth system, and a wide range of customizable jobs. Collect items, unlock powerful Wonder Skills, and raise a Spirit Beast companion that evolves with the story. Spin the roulette, grow stronger, and uncover the truth behind the sealed legends!
70010000111552.intro: Master the board game with Spirit Beasts in a pixel-art fantasy RPG!
70010000111552.name: Dragon Spira

70010000112159.description:
Step into the warm world of Cute Bonfire, a charming pixel-art puzzle game set inside a fireplace. Take control of a little fire spirit that moves tile by tile, pushing charcoal pieces to light up the bonfires. With 30 levels of gradually increasing difficulty, delightful visuals, and a cozy, relaxing atmosphere, Cute Bonfire is perfect for casual players who love the satisfaction of solving puzzles.

Guide your fire spirit across the grid, pushing charcoals in the right order to ignite all the bonfires. Each level is a mini challenge of observation, planning, and clever moves, with undo and restart options to help you experiment without pressure. Stones and wooden obstacles block your path, adding to the strategic depth, while the gentle pixel-art style and warm ambiance make every session comforting and enjoyable.

Whether you’re a puzzle lover or just looking for a cozy, bite-sized challenge, Cute Bonfire invites you to light up every hearth and enjoy a spark of satisfaction.
70010000112159.name: Cute Bonfire

70010000113774.description:
You know all the rules and possible combinations, so just enjoy new levels and new obstacles! This bowling is still not the classical one.

Knock down everithing with just one shot. It's challenging and fun!

Try the newest levels — you will be surprised at how strange they are!   

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

New even more strange levels to discover!
70010000113774.intro: Play bowling in this puzzle way. Use your mind first!
70010000113774.name: Pin Strike 3

70010000114630.description:
Screw Master is a fun and engaging puzzle game where players must strategically remove screws to dismantle intricate wooden structures. Each level presents a new challenge requiring logical thinking and precise actions. With 50 levels of increasing difficulty, can you master the art of unscrewing?

Gameplay Features:
- Challenging Puzzle Mechanics - Unscrew, remove planks, and clear the board!
- Realistic Physics - Every screw holds the structure together, so plan your moves wisely.
- Strategic Thinking - Remove screws in the right order to prevent getting stuck.
- Time-Based Challenges - Beat the clock to complete levels efficiently!

Power-Ups to Help You! 
- Hammer - Instantly removes a plank, clearing the way.
- Drill - Adds an extra hole to free trapped pieces.
- Screwdriver - Removes a screw completely, bypassing any restrictions.
- Freeze - Stops time, giving you more time to think and solve the puzzle.

Use these tools wisely to tackle tougher puzzles and progress through levels!

Levels & Progression 
- 50 unique levels, each introducing new mechanics and increasing complexity.
-  Unlock power-ups as you advance to help with more intricate puzzles.
- Dismantle creative wooden structures, testing your logic and precision.

Why You’ll Love Screw Master!
- Addictive and relaxing gameplay
- Satisfying visuals and realistic sound effects
- Simple controls but deep strategy

Are you ready to become the Screw Master? Start unscrewing now and see if you can clear all 50 levels!
70010000114630.intro: Are you good with a screwdriver?
70010000114630.name: Screw Master

70010000114853.description:
The Hidden Cats are celebrating the holidays in the magical Christmas World Park!

Start with a snowy, grey canvas and watch it burst into festive colors as you spot more than 900 hidden kittens and characters inspired by global traditions.

Discover photos of real cats from the Hidden Cats community and pair them with illustrated felines to unlock 7 bonus stages featuring a new progressive colorization effect!

Game Features:
- 900+ hidden objects, 8 unique levels with unlockables
- Collectible cards, achievements, secrets to discover
- Hand-drawn art & original soundtrack with dynamic sound effects
- NEW! All maps fill with colour as you progress!
70010000114853.intro: Reveal the magic of Christmas colors with the Hidden Cats!
70010000114853.name: Hidden Cats in Christmas

70010000112625.description:
This pack includes the games:

-Rock ´N Racing Off Road
-Speed Truck Racing
-WildTrax Racing
-Rally Rock ´N Racing
70010000112625.intro: Enjoy 4 games in 1 with this irresistible games pack!
70010000112625.name: Dirt Racing Bundle 4 in 1

70010000115956.description:
Discover charming worlds piece by piece in Jigsaw Realms: Villages, a relaxing jigsaw experience set in beautifully illustrated fantasy and stylized villages. From cozy countryside hamlets to magical towns tucked between hills and rivers, each puzzle invites you to slow down and enjoy the journey.

Play using touch controls or controllers, and switch between them anytime for a smooth experience whether you’re playing handheld or docked. Thanks to the saving system, you can stop at any moment and continue later without losing progress.

Features;
> 30 handcrafted jigsaw levels featuring beautiful villages
> Fantasy and stylized village artwork in a consistent, cozy art style
> Touch controls and controller support, switch anytime
> Save and resume freely whenever you want
> A calm, cozy experience for all ages
70010000115956.name: Jigsaw Realms: Villages

70050000068049.description: Do you know a city whose symbol is two goats? Discover Poznań! A Polish city full of interesting places and beautiful corners. Search for hidden objects on another colorful map.
70050000068049.intro: New map, new challenges, new hidden objects!
70050000068049.name: Spy Guy Poznan

70010000094880.description:
The long-running Hakuoki otome visual novel series enters a new era! Hakuoki SSL ~Sweet School Life~ puts a modern spin on the Edo period romance of the main series, instead casting heroine Chizuru and the handsome warriors of the Shinsengumi as students and teachers living in modern Japan. School life antics ensue as these beloved characters hold a school festival, stress over midterms, get into watergun fights and more!

Experience a fun slice-of-life story through unlockable event scenes, engaging dialogue and beautifully illustrated character portraits, all localized in English for the first time. Explore unique endings with each character and enjoy mini-games that make this standalone entry extra special!

• Take the role of Chizuru as she’s surrounded by familiar faces in a new modern setting!
• Engage in fun mini-games with the handsome warriors of the Shinsengumi.
• Make key choices and discover unique endings with each possible love interest!
• Enjoy voiceovers in Japanese and newly localized text in English.
• Navigate scenarios with ease using a variety of UI controls and preferences!
70010000094880.intro: Reunite with familiar faces in a light-hearted modern setting filled with fun and fluffy romance!
70010000094880.name: Hakuoki SSL ~Sweet School Life~

70010000097729.description:
Centipede Gun is a creature-building roguelite inspired by games like SNKRX and FLERP, where you create unusual beings by combining different shapes, modules, and... weapons!?
Try out insane combinations and try to break the game with the craziest creations! Each combination offers new possibilities to defeat enemies in increasingly challenging battles. After each round, use the money you earn to buy different units in the store and further strengthen your centipede of destruction. But be careful — as you evolve, enemies also become stronger, testing the limits of your creativity and strategy.

Assemble strange and powerful centipedes whose weapons automatically attack when enemies approach. Use special modules to add extra effects to your attacks and combine modules of the same type to evolve them, unlocking secret abilities as you reach new levels of power. Survive if you can and find out how far your centipede can go!
70010000097729.name: Centipede Gun

70010000102648.description:
Embark on an adorable adventure, discover new friends and uncover everything the island has to offer.
Climb, Swim, Glide and slide your way into the hearts of the many different characters you meet on your travels!

The island is your playground
There’s a buddy atop every hill in this open-world, movement-focused adventure and they all seem to need help! Bop cardboard baddies, brave serene hills and forests, and scale sheer rocks that only a kid would dare!

Joyful Exporation
Explore a lovingly crafted island full to the brim with areas to discover, friends to make and joy to be had. Each area of the island brings unique quests and characters to meet. Glide through the mountain tops and drop in on the Theatre Troupe kids, swing your stick sword through the forest with the Prep schoolers or find the ‘Cool Kids’ down in the Creaklands. With plenty more areas to discover, there's no knowing who you might run into!

Make Friends
The world is big when you’re a lil gator... Good thing it’s also full of friends! Make new friends and invite them to play in the islands playground. Each new friend you make will add to your adventure, but making new friends isn’t always easy, You might have to complete a quest or two!

Crafty Customization
Collect arts & crafts supplies all over the island! Use them to make yourself all kinds of goodies and bring the playground to life! Craft new abilities - use your ragdoll teddy to ragdoll lil gator from mountain top to the valleys below! Skim pebbles into hard to reach cardboard baddies!

Bop Baddies
A no-pressure adventure game! Lil Gator game focuses on adventure and play, don't let a health bar hold you back from reaching your goal!

Lil Gator Game: In the Dark

Make way for Lil Gator Game: In the Dark. Lil Gator is back with an all new BIG Expansion, doubling the size of Lil Gator Game.

In this charming expansion, you’ll find that new adventures and friends are just beneath the surface—literally! Get ready to “cave in” to the fun and find that you’re stalag-right where you belong!

This BIG adventure is filled to the brim with all the charm and humour you loved in Lil Gator Game. There is a buddy in every cave and crevasse in this NEW, BIG, UNDERGROUND ADVENTURE!
70010000102648.intro: The complete Lil Gator adventure, all bundled up in one heartwarming package.
70010000102648.name: Lil Gator Game: Gator of the Year Edition

70010000105926.description:
[Game Overview]  
A roguelite action game set in the BLAZBLUE universe, featuring striking 2D visuals, stylish, fast-paced combat, and precise, responsive controls.
Command a line-up of unique characters from the renowned BLAZBLUE franchise and dive into an unparalleled action experience.
[Story]
At a mysterious domain, known as “the Lab”, a group of elite researchers race to save a collapsing word; however, despite their efforts to date, Dr. Mercurius, head of the laboratory, still warns the world’s downfall is near.
In a last-ditch effort, the urgent *Research of Possibility* initiative seeks to collect *Shards of Possibility*—a special fragment of the world that could forestall the seemingly inevitable destruction.
These shards lie within the *Sea of Possibility*, a realm between worlds, beyond the bounds of reality.
Our protagonist, *Ace*, is the only being capable of diving into this sea.  
Guided by the elite researchers at *the Lab*, Ace descends again and again in pursuit of salvation—until strange visions take hold and his body begins to change.
As Ace continues to dive, countless memories flood his mind, and the truth behind the collapsing world—and the research itself—begins to surface....
“……The Power of Azure.”
70010000105926.name: Blazblue Entropy Effect X

70010000112196.description:
This game is a monorail simulation game set in Soi Mountain, a representative natural landmark in Korea.
Players become a monorail driver, taking in the breathtaking scenery of Soi Mountain and experiencing the unique experience of operating a monorail through beautiful natural and cultural heritage sites.

This is the first title to utilize actual filmed sections of the Hwagae Mountain monorail!

Key Features

• Realistic Monorail Driving Experience

Uses high-quality footage of actual Soi Mountain monorail sections.

Experience driving a monorail through diverse landscapes and terrain.

Two play modes: section-by-section driving mode and view mode.

• Control System

Just like driving a real monorail, precise control is required, including acceleration, deceleration, and stopping.

Compared to regular railways, the game features numerous uphill and downhill sections and significant impacts, requiring appropriate acceleration and deceleration control.

Ensuring on-time operation and stopping locations are crucial challenges, providing players with a truly engaging experience.
 
• Realistic Scenery and Atmosphere

Pass through the Soisan Monorail section and admire the surrounding mountains, nature, and tourist attractions through footage shot on the actual monorail.

Enjoy the natural beauty of Korea through high-definition footage that realistically recreates the breathtaking scenery as you ride.

Recommended for:

• Gamers who enjoy monorails and natural scenery
• Players who want to experience Korea's famous attractions and travels through games
• Users who prefer realistic simulations that emphasize nature and scenery

This game offers a unique opportunity to experience Hwagaesan and its surrounding natural landscapes by monorail.
It's a truly unforgettable experience for lovers of Korean nature and monorails!
70010000112196.intro: This simulation game lets you operate a train directly, based on footage of actual trains in motion!
70010000112196.name: Korean Monorail Panorama Line Soisan

70010000112537.description:
Bubble Battle is a retro local multiplayer fighting game inspired by arcade classics. Players fly around with one simple objective: burst opponents’ bubbles before they burst yours. Collect powerups and out-maneuver opponents for fast-paced, addictive fun!

Bubble Battle is designed for those craving a local party game experience reminiscent of the 80's and 90's. 

Players fly around with one simple objective: burst opponents’ bubbles before they burst yours. Collect powerups and out-maneuver opponents for fast-paced, addictive fun!

FEATURES

- Easy to pick up and play thanks to simple controls

- Quick gameplay - rounds are usually less than 2 minutes (the arena becomes smaller toward the end of a round)

- A selection of variants, powerups, and levels deliver many unique experiences.
70010000112537.name: Bubble Battle

70010000115441.description:
Your Choices Chart the Course.
Become the hero of your own high-seas saga. In a world where the rival kingdoms of Sidonia and Glorianna teeter on the brink of war, you are caught in a deadly race for survival. Hunted by the sadistic Captain Skarvench and drifting across the sea, you hold a secret that could rewrite the fate of the world. The power to become a legend of the seas is in your hands, but the deck is stacked against you.

Forge Your Unique Path.
Begin by choosing your class and assembling a crew of unlikely allies. Then, set sail into a rich narrative where every choice has profound consequences. Will you cross swords with undead pirates, survive deadly encounters with creatures of the deep, or dare to awaken ancient gods? Whatever path you take, the greatest threat is the vision of your own defeat. Your decisions create unique "Story Moments" that permanently shape your journey, making each playthrough distinctly yours. With hundreds of branching paths, uncover new secrets, alliances, and endings with every replay.
70010000115441.intro:
Set sail on your very own epic pirate adventure.
Choose your class, forge your legend, and navigate a sea of perilous choices in this immersive gamebook adventure.
70010000115441.name: Down Among the Dead Men
